ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 63
ygData.msgSnippet: ... strong ... warrior ... to 15 ... No.  Comparing classes soloing is a waste of time.  The game is not geared for solo play at higher levels.  Eventually
ygData.messageBody:
> Date: Mon, 14 Jun 1999 11:32:54 -0400
> From: Kelly Pruett <pruett@...>
>Subject: Re: You want to know how weak warriors! Listen to this!
>
>4.) A solo spellcaster can fry a mob in about 30 to 45 seconds with 5 or 6
strong
>spells, followed by about a 5 minute 'meditation enhanced' downtime. A solo
warrior
>can kill a mob in about 1 to 3 minutes with many, many hits, followed by up
to 15
>minutes of pure butt sitting. Anyone else think this is slightly unfair for
>gameplay?


No. Comparing classes soloing is a waste of time. The game is not geared
for solo play at higher levels. Eventually every class will not be able to
solo effectively.

>We had kills stolen many many times and nothing frustrates you more than
bleeding
>from a mob that is stolen from you in mid fight. We tried getting
spellcasters into
>our group, but at our level, most were doing better playing solo. From all
of this I
>gathered that two things need to be done.


In the example you gave, the solo wizards weren't really solo. They were
letting your group tank for a bit of the damage. Once your group had
damaged it enough, the wizard would then start blasting and kill-steal it.


>
>One, if Verant wants to give groups a better advantage than solos, then by
all means
>allow group damage to overcome the 'single greatest damage dealer gets the
kill'
>rule. Or bump it up somehow. It doesn't have to be much but for god sakes
... people
>having fun as a team should be rewarded for their organization and
coordination. It
>requires effort and patience to play well as a team. It requires nearly
nothing to
>play well alone.



Agreed. The GROUP that does the most damage should get the kill, not the
person who does the most damage.


>
>Two, wizzies need to be toned down on solo just a little. I have nothing
against
>powerful wizards. I have EVERYTHING against solos who steal other people's
kills in
>mid battle. Or even if they are grouped for that matter.


As you said, these Wizzes were high levels, 20+. If they want to farm lower
creatures that give them no experience, that is a camping problem, not a
problem with wizards.





Wayne
